messages.title: It's a two-horse race here in North East Hampshire!
messages.content: In the North East Hampshire seat a two-horse race is developing between the Liberal Democrats and the incumbent Conservative. Unlike in NE Deal, neither Labour or the Greens have ever won a single seat on Hart District Council.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats were the original green party. Will stand on record to urge the radical action needed, ensuring all cars are electric by 2030.
Will stop every development we legally can and fight all others, ensure infrastructure provision is met before additional houses.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: SAVE our NHS and More Police
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Will take back the billions of pounds given to private companies by Tory sell-offs, bring back officers from Northern Ireland, and protect local services.

To avoid trade deals to the regions, Northern Ireland border, renewal costs, the shared prosperity we built with the EU, and the mess created by Conservatives and Labour, the only way to stop this nightmare is to Stop Brexit.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In North East Hampshire there is a two-horse race developing between the Liberal Democrats and the incumbent Conservative.

issues.brexitEurope: Stop Brexit - Warning! The only way to stop this Brexit madness.
issues.environment: Will stand on record to urge the radical action needed, ensuring all cars are electric by 2030.
issues.health: Will take back the billions of pounds given to private companies by Tory sell-offs.

housing.content: Will stop every development we legally can and fight all others, ensure infrastructure provision is met before additional houses.

images.caption: Graham Cockarill with a message about his key priorities for North East Hampshire.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Liberal Democrats are the main party challengers. Only the Lib Dems can beat the Conservatives in North East Hampshire.
